attributes.action: For a Ring road - Bypass for Boston Lincolnshire.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please note Boston has been waiting for a bypass for over 30 years or more.
The Government should invest properly in the UK's road network and develops a coherent national strategy to stop pointless traffic congestion.
The Road congestion and traffic jams are Worst in Boston Lincs and this government is not investing the £45 billion a year in motoring taxes.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
